assessment.title: Is my advisory right for you?
assessment.subtitle: Identify your challenges and find out if my three pillars of expertise are the right approach for your Data & AI strategy.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You know data and AI can create value ‚Äî but the connection to revenue, costs, or differentiation isn't always clear.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Without clear connection to business goals, efforts become isolated, unfocused, or purely experimental ‚Äî with low ROI.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: As a Practitioner, Advisor, and Solution Builder, I bridge the strategy-execution gap by connecting Data & AI initiatives with tangible business outcomes and creating a focused, value-driven roadmap.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You're working under intense time pressure with multiple competing priorities.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Data & AI decisions are complex, technical, and easy to delay ‚Äî or get wrong ‚Äî without the right insights.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: My triple expertise enables concise, executive-ready advisory that accelerates intelligent decision-making and simplifies complex landscapes.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: The market is flooded with Data & AI promises, tools, and platforms.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Leaders struggle to distinguish what's truly valuable from what's just buzz ‚Äî risking paralysis or misinvestment.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: As an active Practitioner and Solution Builder, I serve as a trusted filter ‚Äî evaluating trends, technologies, and vendors to focus efforts on what's mature, meaningful, and aligned with business requirements.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: Every company collects data ‚Äî but most don't fully leverage it to drive insights or automation.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Poor data quality, silos, or unclear ownership often block progress and make Data & AI efforts slow or ineffective.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: My practical experience as a Solution Builder helps assess data readiness, build foundational capabilities, and prioritize use cases that unlock immediate and long-term value.

challenges.title: Growing and competing with Data & AI

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You want to use Data & AI to increase revenue, improve margins, or differentiate from competitors.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: You often don't know where to start, or lack internal capabilities to move beyond pilot projects.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: As an Advisor and Solution Builder, I identify quick wins and scalable strategies that help companies use Data & AI for meaningful, measurable advantage.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: Data and AI create value ‚Äî but also expose companies to regulatory, ethical, and reputational risks.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Without strategy for responsible Data & AI use, companies risk non-compliance, biased outcomes, or public backlash.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: My practical experience as a Practitioner and strategic expertise as an Advisor bring proven governance frameworks and ethical design principles to ensure Data & AI is deployed safely, responsibly, and in alignment with emerging regulations.

cta.title: Do you recognize yourself in these challenges?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss in a free 15-minute call how my three pillars of expertise can help you.
